backgroundInformationList.description: CANCELLATION - Notice of Public Meeting - Rental Housing Demolition and Conversion Application - 147, 151 and 153 Vaughan Road

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription:
CANCELLATION NOTICE

OF PUBLIC MEETING

 

Location of Application: 147, 151 and 153 Vaughan Road

  Rental Housing Demolition and Conversion Application

Application Number: 20 205135 STE 12 RH

Applicant: Bousfields Inc.

 

A Notice of Public Meeting was originally sent to you on October 20, 2023.  Please be advised that this application will NOT be considered by the Toronto and East York Community Council on November 15, 2023.

 

This Public Meeting has been CANCELLED and will be scheduled for a later date. You will be notified of the date, time and location of the Public Meeting.

 

Compliance with Provincial laws respecting Notice may result in you receiving duplicate notices.
title: Notice of Cancellation of Public Meeting - Rental Housing Demolition and Conversion Application - 147, 151 and 153 Vaughan Road
